data.title: Maher Anjum MBA, FRSA on LinkedIn: #seasonbangladrama22
data.meta_description:
Great panel of speakers and host coming together on Tuesday 15th Oitij-jo, part of #seasonbangladrama22 . Book your ticket now.

https://lnkd.in/e8r-Dab7
data.text:
#FreeToBeMe. #southasianheritagemonth The thought is always there, lurking in the background, people will think I have truly gone mad. Sometimes the mad ideas do make sense. Having the game of Kabaddi was the most fun we have all had for a long long time. So much laughing, shouting, making up the rules, physical exercise - none of us had so much cardio work out (!) for a long time. Followed by eating together, talking, relaxing - 'adda' - time to hang out with no worries or concerns. The saying goes, 'laughter is the best medicine'. That is true, with a little bit of time and space for ourselves. #FreeToBeMe #southasianheritagemonth

Making Our Way A throw away comment in a recent conversation made me think, 'well, what have I really, really done in the last few months - to be specific, January - to date?' First point of correction - not I. What have WE Oitij-jo done as a team. Central to all our work: 1) creativity in all its forms & more for all 2) equitable collaborative engagement and partnership with multiple layers of stakeholders simultaneously and continuously 3) sustainability - financial and environmental 4) inclusive and open to all to interact with outputs of the work produced; whilst focusing narrowly on the demographic criteria of the, 'active designer-makers'. Work So Far: January 1) " I Don't Call Enough but I am Here Now" - a contemporary art installation by artist #LaisulHoque , curated by #JannatHusaain and production support by #GabrielOrengoWalter. The Greenhouse @ Republic 2) #OITIJJOKitchen opens at Rich Mix 3) #OITIJJOKitchen starts residency at #PoplarWorks, The Trampery | Certified B Corp 4) #OITIJJOKitchen - new recruits start training February 1) #BottlingFutures - preserve, pickling, fermenting and more demonstration and workshop 2) Planting with students March Everything happening ðŸ˜…. Juggling all balls in the air! Celebrate #IWD24 with full team April 1) Publication of article on #OITIJJOKitchen by #GentleAuthor #SpitalfirldsLife 2) Celebrate Eid & Pohela Baishak with #BokBokBooks Rumana Yasmin author Jumana Nikita Rahman of #BhortaBhortaBaby and special lunch by #OITIJJOKitchen at Rich Mix 3) #OITIJJODesignStudios - 1st four trainees complete Stage 1& 2 of their training and organized exhibition to commemorate 23rd April - #RanaPlaza Fashion Revolution #IMadeYourClothes. May 1) Creative Reflections: - start of a new series of conversations: Ruhul Abdin and #Puer_Deorum ,'Making art and architecture in Dhaka, Bangladesh'. 2) Show & Tell on the road - #OITIJJOKitchen, #OITIJJODesignStudios and #BottlingFutures - all members: display, demonstrate and discuss individual projects that they are part of to #EastendHomes residents Paul Wilson 3) PLAY MAKERS: CO-DESIGN WORKSHOP- making 'Putul / Dolls' and more at Rich Mix and brunch by #OITIJJOKitchen, We continue to juggle all balls in the air into the 2nd half of the year. Join me and the team. Take part in an event. Come have some food with us. Order some food for your event from us. Talk to us about what you would like to see happen and take part in. Support us.
